requirements: Enrollment limited to first-year students. Preregistration required; see under First-Year Seminar Program.
description:
Introduction to the art and historical development of letterpress printing and to the evolution of private presses. Survey of hand printing; practical study of press operations using antique platen presses and the cylinder proof press. Material qualities of printed matter, connections between content and typographic form, and word/image relationships.
Enrollment limited to first-year students. Preregistration required; see under First-Year Seminar Program.
title: Art of the Printed Word
